Question: U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS)

CES 2024 Product Highlight and Specification

- DHS is preparing for the future by identifying eight Strategic Priority Research Areas (SPRA) to focus on Innovation, Research, and Development (IRD) investments through FY30.
- The Silicon Valley Innovation Program (SVIP) bridges technology development gap between DHS S&T, startups, and small businesses, offering non-dilutive funding, guidance, and direct access to operational end-users.
- The Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) program supports U.S. small businesses to develop new processes, products, and technologies in support of the U.S. government missions.
- The Screening at Speed Program aims to deliver transformative research and development focused on delivering the checkpoint of the future to the Transportation Security Administration.

For more detailed information, visit https://www.dhs.gov/science-and-technology
Summary_cn:
美国国土安全部（DHS）

CES 2024产品亮点和规格

- DHS正在为未来做准备，通过2026财年至2030财年的创新、研究和开发（IRD）投资，确定了八个战略优先研究领域（SPRA）。
- 硅谷创新计划（SVIP）桥接了DHS S&T、初创企业和小企业之间的技术开发差距，提供非稀释性资金、指导和直接访问业务最终用户。
- 小企业创新研究计划（SBIR）支持美国小企业开发新的流程、产品和技术，以支持美国政府的任务。
- 快速筛查计划旨在提供改革性的研究和开发，致力于为交通安全管理局提供未来的检查点。

如需更详细信息，请访问https://www.dhs.gov/science-and-technology
